resources.string:
Theremin is in alpha stage. Use it as a metal detector or as a musical instrument. You might manipulate the magnetic field around your phone with metal objects or your ear phones to play some notes. 

 == changelog ==
 v0.1.2 22/07/2010 
 -force close bug corrected 
 v0.1 17/07/2010 
 -first release (alpha)
